faq.question: How do I purchase my 2026 Convention Package?
faq.answer: The following link will take you to the site where you are able to choose and purchase your ticket(s)/package(s). https://boba-usa.ticketspice.com/minnesota

faq.question: Can I purchase my 2026 Convention Package via cash, PayPal, Zelle, CashApp, Venmo or through my chapter president?
faq.answer: No. You will only be able to purchase Convention Packages through the online platform with a debit or credit card.

faq.question: I have sent money to the National Treasurer for my convention package. Will I receive my ticket(s)/package(s)?
faq.answer: No. You will need to contact the National Treasurer to refund you and purchase online. The National Treasurer will not be taking any Convention Package payments and dues.

faq.question: Can I purchase at the gate?
faq.answer: ABSOLUTELY! Tickets can be purchased at the gate by scanning our onsite QR Code using a valid debit or credit card. Cash transactions will NOT be accepted. Henceforth, we are going cashless.

faq.question: How will I receive my ticket(s)/package(s)?
faq.answer: You will receive an email with your ticket(s)/package(s), which you will present to a gate attendant for check-in upon your arrival at the 2026 Convention. Your ticket(s)/package(s) will be sent to the email you used when inputting payment information.

faq.question: Can I purchase ticket(s)/package(s) for family members and/or friends?
faq.answer: ABSOLUTELY! When purchasing multiple packages, ensure that you choose how many of which ticket(s)/package(s) you want and fill out the information completely for each person you are purchasing for (their name, phone number, email address, and chapter, if applicable).

faq.question: If I purchase a ticket(s)/package(s) on behalf of a family member or friend, how will they get their ticket(s)/package(s)?
faq.answer: The ticket/package will be emailed to the email address entered when asked for billing information. From there, you can text or email the individual their personal ticket/package.

faq.question: I have input my billing/confirmation information, but the system will not allow me to submit. What do I do?
faq.answer: Please make sure that all required fields at the ticket/package purchase level are filled out and that you are using a valid debit or credit card. If all of this is complete, and you are still getting an error, please take a screenshot of the error message and share it in an email to the BOBA-USA contact support at tabehisaac@gmail.com, Subject line BOBA-USA 2026 National Convention.

faq.question: Due to reasons beyond my control, I am unable to come to the 2026 Convention. Can I get a refund?
faq.answer: We are surely going to miss you. No, you cannot get a refund at this time.

faq.question: I cannot find the email that was sent with my ticket(s)/package(s) information. How can I retrieve it?
faq.answer: You will find a link at the top of the webpage that reads 'Resend Confirmation,' and follow the instructions.

faq.question: Will my card information be saved/stored in the system?
faq.answer: No, your card information will not be saved or stored in the system.

faq.question: Is it safe to buy tickets through TicketSpice?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a legitimate platform that has been customized to manage ticketing for the BOBA-USA Convention starting 2026. TicketSpice is protected by military-grade encryption—the same level of security used by major banks.

faq.question: How safe is my personal information?
faq.answer: Your personal information is safe. While you may get emails from BOBA-USA about your ticket and the convention, your information will not be sold, accessed, or shared with other companies. Your credit or debit card number is never shared or transmitted when you make a payment.

faq.question: What do I receive if I sponsor or donate?
faq.answer: As a sponsor or donor, you will receive a convention medal upon arrival and free access to all event venues for you and your spouse or friends. VIP table service, including drinks, and you will have the opportunity to inspire attendees.

faq.question: Can I pledge to support the event?
faq.answer: No, we do not accept pledge donations. Instead, you can make a payment using our QR code, show your payment confirmation to the convention team, and your donation will be acknowledged.

faq.question: How many guests can I bring if I sponsor the convention?
faq.answer: $1,000 sponsorship – You receive a convention medal, VIP service, and may bring 2 guests to your table. • $2,000 sponsorship – You receive a convention medal, VIP service, and may bring 3 guests to your table. • $3,000 sponsorship – You receive a convention medal, VIP service, and may bring 4 guests to your table. • $4,000 sponsorship – You receive a convention medal, VIP service, and may bring 5 guests to your table. • $5,000 sponsorship – You receive a convention medal, VIP service, and may bring 6 guests to your table. • $6,000 sponsorship – You receive a convention medal, VIP service, and may bring 8 guests to your table. ** N.B: Please list the Full names, email, and phone number of your accompanying guests when registering. All sponsor and donor please send us your company logo and official website link in advance at tabehisaac@gmail.com subject line BOBA-USA 2026 NATIONAL CONVENTION

faq.question: Where do I pay my membership dues?
faq.answer: You can pay your dues using the BOBA-USA Membership Manager section.

faq.question: Can I pay my chapter and national dues when purchasing my convention package?
faq.answer: Yes, you can pay both chapter and national dues using a debit or credit card. To pay chapter dues, select “Create New Chapter” and choose your chapter. And national dues “Create New National” select BOBA-USA NATIONAL DUES.

faq.question: What if I already sent my dues to the national or chapter treasurer??
faq.answer: If you have already paid your dues to the national or chapter treasurer, you need to pay through our platform and then request a refund from the respective treasurer.

faq.question: Why should I pay my dues using the BOBA-USA TicketSpice platform?
faq.answer: The BOBA-USA TicketSpice platform automatically generates your Chapter Membership ID Number and National ID Number, like a Social Security number. These IDs provide discounts on future convention packages and official BOBA-USA merchandise, including uniforms, hats, and other accessories.

faq.question: When does registration for the BOBA-USA National Convention open?
faq.answer: Monday, January 26, 2026, at 8:00 am EST.

faq.question: What are the best travel options to reach Dallas from international destinations?
faq.answer: We recommend checking major airline aggregators like Google Flights, Skyscanner, and Kayak for the most up-to-date flight options. We also suggest pre-booking airport transfers or utilizing ride-sharing services like Uber or Lyft  for ground transportation from the airport. Your convention event confirmation email will provide detailed directions and transportation options. .

faq.question: What is the specific destination airport in Dallas for the BOBA-USA 2026 Convention?
faq.answer: Dallas has two main airports: Dallas/Fort Worth International Airport (DFW), the large international hub between Dallas and Fort Worth, and Dallas Love Field (DAL), a smaller airport closer to downtown, primarily serving Southwest Airlines. DFW is the primary international gateway, while DAL offers convenient access to the city center. .

faq.question: What are the major airlines in the United States using MPS destination?
faq.answer: https://www.mspairport.com/

faq.question: Will there be visa assistance for international attendees?
faq.answer: If you require a visa, please contact BOBA-USA Public Relations Officer Mr. Isaac Tabeh (646-509-9274) (tabehisaac@gmail.com) immediately after registering. We can provide a letter of invitation and guidance on the visa application process, but we cannot guarantee visa issuance. Please check the visa requirements for your home country well in advance, as processing times can vary.

faq.question: As an international convention delegate, who is my point of contact in the United States of America?
faq.answer: The contact person is the BOBA-USA National Convention Chair, Dr. Christopher Fokumlah [612-296-5143] [cfokumlah@hotmail.com].

faq.question: I was denied a visa. Can I get a refund?
faq.answer: We are sad to hear that. Unfortunately, we do not guarantee a refund currently.

faq.question: What is the weather like in Dallas during July?
faq.answer: During July, the Thousand Lakes, the beautiful city of Dallas, typically experiences pleasantly warm and breezy weather, with average highs of 83°F (28°C) and lows of 63°F (17°C). We recommend packing your car at the hotel premises. It is free and complimentary with your room night.

faq.question: What currency is used in Dallas, and are our credit cards widely accepted?
faq.answer: The local currency is US Dollars. Credit cards (Visa, Mastercard, American Express) are widely accepted at most establishments. However, it's advisable to have some local currency for smaller purchases. ATMs are readily available throughout the city.

faq.question: What accommodation options are available, and is there a preferred hotel?
faq.answer: We have secured a discounted rate at Hilton Hotel for convention attendees. You can book your room through the Hotel Hilton Dallas. We recommend that all attendees take advantage of this accommodation discount. Due to high demand, we recommend booking your accommodation as soon as possible.

faq.question: Will there be opportunities for networking and socialization?
faq.answer: Absolutely! We have planned dedicated networking sessions, social events, and informal gatherings to facilitate connections among alumni.You can find the detailed event schedule on our convention event page.

faq.question: Are there any planned tours or cultural experiences?
faq.answer: Yes! We have curated a selection of optional tours and cultural experiences showcasing the best of Dallas. The tour options and booking details are on our convention event page. We recommend booking your tours in advance, as spaces are limited..

faq.question: What dining options will be available, and are there options for dietary restrictions?
faq.answer: We will provide various dining options, including American, Mexican, and French. Please indicate any dietary restrictions (vegetarian, vegan, gluten-free, allergies) during registration so we can ensure suitable meal options for you.

faq.question: Will an event app or online platform be available for updates and communication?
faq.answer: We will use the BOBA-USA TicketSpice Platform for convention event updates, schedule changes, networking, and communication. You will receive an email confirmation, update, and text messages if any changes occur. The convention event platform BOBA-USA TicketSpice will be your primary source for real-time information.

faq.question: Can I, as a sponsor, add another BOBAN to my list of those who are supposed to accompany me?
faq.answer: Sponsors and donors should add only non-BOBANs (family members /family friends/ spouse/children/coworkers/business partners, etc.). We encourage each BOBAN to use the Membership Manager to make chapter dues payments and national due payments and to have a chapter membership ID and national membership ID.

faq.question: What if I don’t have enough people to add to my list?
faq.answer: Contact the PRO immediately to get additional information.

faq.question: What are my options if I am a BOBAN and don’t belong to a chapter?
faq.answer: We encourage BOBANs to select a chapter that ties their states together, or you can choose BOBA at Large.

faq.question: I am not a BOBAN, but I am sponsoring the convention for $6,000, and the event page requires me to fill out the membership manager section. What is my option?
faq.answer: Go to Chapter Dues, select Create New Chapter, and choose “none chapter (non-BOBANS) and National Dues. Select “Create new National.” Choose none national (non-BOBANs)

faq.question: When can the BOBA-USA central Bank transfer funds to my chapter bank account?
faq.answer: Funds are transferred quarterly, and transaction records are published.BOBA-USA Central Bank(National Treasury) Chapter Bank Account(Chapter Treasury)

faq.question: When does the host chapter receive its convention net assets, if any?
faq.answer: Convention net assets are transferred to the chapter bank account a month after the convention, and records are published. In case convention ends on July 6 OR July 7, all chapter net assets are transfered on August 6 OR August 7 Respectively

faq.question: I am sponsoring the convention for $5,000 and can bring 6 guests, but I have only 2. What is my option?
faq.answer: Contact the PRO immediately to get additional information

faq.question: What is the distance from the airport to the hotel (convention venue)?
faq.answer: It’s approximately 14 to 20 minutes by car.

faq.question: I am a BOBAN, sponsoring the convention for $6,000, and the event page requires me to fill out the membership manager section. I have already paid my membership dues to my chapter treasurer. What are my options?
faq.answer: For $6,000, sponsor your BOBA-USA convention with pride. Pay your chapter membership dues on the event page and National dues to ensure you have your membership ID number for chapter and national. Send your company logo and official website link to the PRO if applicable. Contact your chapter treasurer for your chapter dues refunds.
